name: The Jester's Roll
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • LMB to shoot

The Jester is up to his silly tricks again, and this time the King has personally come out to stop him! Be wary of his tricky attacks as you duel him in his own world of dice!

The dice the jester throws at you not only affect how the Jester attacks, but can also change your weapon! Use whatever is handed to you in order to put the Jester in his place!

Developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
